snippet: Shaping the browsers of the future has become a spirited struggle among the big tech companies that see the mobile world as a make-or-break business.
abstract: Big tech companies are engaged in a fierce competition to shape next generation of Web browsers, mirroring a similar battle in the 1990s; browsers have gained importance as cloud computing replaces desktop software, providing companies with valuable data on how people use the Web.
lead_paragraph: Shaping the browsers of the future has become a spirited struggle among the big tech companies that see the mobile world as a make-or-break business.

headline.seo: Browser Wars Flare Again, This Time for Phones and Tablets
headline.main: Browser Wars Flare Again, on Little Screens
headline.print_headline: Browser Wars Flare Again, On Little Screens
